description.lang: The PIR sensor PSP05 has PIR sensor function,based on Z-Wave technology.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline
light control
The Interval time for auto report the battery level.0 means turn off auto report battery.The default value is 12.The tick time can setting by the configuration NO.20.
The interval time for auto report the battery level.

Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light.-1(0xFF) means turn on the light.For dimmer equipment 1 to 100 means the light strength.0 means turn off the light.Caution: The range is from 0x00 to 0xFF using hexadecimal notation.
Basic command value to turn on the light.

The interval time for auto report each tick.Setting this configuration will effect configuration NO.10.The unit is 1 minute.Caution 1:Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function.Caution 2:The range is from 0x00 to 0xFF using hexadecimal notation.
The interval time for auto report each tick.

PIR sensitivity setting.0 means disable the PIR motion.1 means the lowest sensitivity.99 means the highest sensitivity.High sensitivity means can detected long distance,but if there is more noise signal in the environment, it will re-trigger toofrequency.
PIR sensitivity setting.
Multisensor function switch.Using bit to control.
Disable delay 5 seconds to turn off the light,when door/window closed.(1:Disable, 0:Enable)
Disable auto turn off the light,after door/window opened to turn on the light.(1:Disable, 0:Enable)
When Bit2 is 0(Enable), Are the device and the lighting in the same room? 0:In the same room(Default), 1:In the different room.
Enable sending motion OFF report.(0:Disable, 1:Enable)
Enable PIR suoer sensitivity mode.
Notification Type,0:Using Notification Report. 1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
Disable Multi CC in auto report.(1:Disable, 0:Enable)
Disable to report battery state when the device triggered.(1:Disable, 0:Enable)

In the normal mode, after the PIR motion detected, setting the re-detect time.8 seconds per tick,default tick is 3(24 seconds).Setting the suitable value to prevent received the trigger signal too frequently. Also can save the battery energy.
Re-detect time

After turn on the light,setting the delay time to turn off the lighting when the PIR motion to turn off the lighting when the PIR motion is not detected.8 seconds per tick,default tick is 4(32 seconds).0 means never send turn off light command.
Delay time to turn off the lighting when the PIR motion is not detected.
